needTips: Need some tips on how t' begin? Here's a straightforward guide!
webStep1Text:
Habitica be naught without real-world goals, so board a few tasks. Ye can add more later as ye reckon o' them! All tasks can be added by skewerin' th' green "Create" button.
* **Set up [T'-Dos](http://habitica.fandom.com/wiki/To-Dos):** Enter tasks ye do once or rarely in th' T'-Dos column, one at a time. Ye can skewer on th' tasks t' edit them 'n add checklists, due dates, 'n more!
* **Set up [Dailies](http://habitica.fandom.com/wiki/Dailies):** Enter activities ye needs t' do daily or on a particular day o' th' week, month, or year in th' Dailies column. Click task t' edit when 'twill be due 'n/or set a start date. Ye can also make it due on a repeatin' basis, fer example, every 3 days.
* **Set up [Habits](http://habitica.fandom.com/wiki/Habits):** Enter habits ye wants t' establish in th' Habits column. Ye can edit th' Habit t' change it t' jus' a good habit :heavy_plus_sign: or a bad habit :heavy_minus_sign:
* **Set up [Rewards](http://habitica.fandom.com/wiki/Rewards):** In addition t' th' in-game Rewards offered, add activities or treats which ye wants t' use as a motivation t' th' Rewards column. 'tis important t' give yourself a break or allow some indulgence in moderation!
* If ye needs inspiration fer which tasks t' add, ye can look at th' wiki's pages on [Sample Habits](http://habitica.fandom.com/wiki/Sample_Habits), [Sample Dailies](http://habitica.fandom.com/wiki/Sample_Dailies), [Sample T'-Dos](http://habitica.fandom.com/wiki/Sample_To-Dos), 'n [Sample Rewards](http://habitica.fandom.com/wiki/Sample_Custom_Rewards).
step2: Step 2: Gain Points by Doing Things in Ye Life
webStep2Text: Now, start tacklin' yer goals from th' list! As ye complete tasks 'n check them off in Habitica, ye will gain [Experience](http://habitica.fandom.com/wiki/Experience_Points), which helps ye level up, 'n [Gold](http://habitica.fandom.com/wiki/Gold_Points), which allows ye t' purchase Rewards. If ye fall into bad habits or wench yer Dailies, ye will lose [Health](http://habitica.fandom.com/wiki/Health_Points). In that way, th' Habitica Experience 'n Health bars serve as a fun indicator o' yer progress toward yer goals. Ye'll start seein' yer real life improve as yer character advances in th' game.
webStep3Text:
Once ye're familiar wit' th' basics, ye can get even more out o' Habitica wit' these nifty features:
 * Organize yer tasks wit' [tags](http://habitica.fandom.com/wiki/Tags) (edit a task t' add them).
 * Customize yer [avatar](http://habitica.fandom.com/wiki/Avatar) by jabbin' th' user icon in th' upper-right corner.
 * Buy yer [Equipment](http://habitica.fandom.com/wiki/Equipment) under Rewards or from th' [Shops](<%= shopUrl %>), 'n change it under [Inventory > Equipment](<%= equipUrl %>).
 * Connect wit' other users via th' [Tavern](http://habitica.fandom.com/wiki/Tavern).
 * Startin' at Level 3, hatch [Pets](http://habitica.fandom.com/wiki/Pets) by collectin' [eggs](http://habitica.fandom.com/wiki/Eggs) 'n [hatchin' potions](http://habitica.fandom.com/wiki/Hatching_Potions). [Feed](http://habitica.fandom.com/wiki/Food) them t' create [Mounts](http://habitica.fandom.com/wiki/Mounts).
 * At level 10: Choose a particular [crew](http://habitica.fandom.com/wiki/Class_System) 'n then use crew-specific [skills](http://habitica.fandom.com/wiki/Skills) (levels 11 t' 14).
 * Form a party wit' yer crew (by clickin' [Crew](<%= partyUrl %>) in th' navigation bar) t' stay accountable 'n earn an Adventure scroll.
 * Defeat monsters 'n collect objects on [adventures](http://habitica.fandom.com/wiki/Quests) (ye will be given an adventure at level 15).
overviewQuestions:
'ave questions? Check out th' [FAQ](<%= faqUrl %>)! If yer riddle ain't mentioned thar, ye can ask fer further help in th' [Habitica Help guild](<%= helpGuildUrl %>). 
 
Good luck wit' yer tasks!
